item.title: The 200 Black Friday deals you can still get
item.description: Black Friday is technically a thing of the past, but many of the best deals we told you about yesterday — including deep discounts on the AirPods Pro 3, the Pixel Watch 4, and the latest Kindle Paperwhite — are still kicking for now. In some cases, gadgets are out of stock at certain stores, […]

item.title: FBI says hackers have stolen $262 million in account takeover scams in 2025 so far - here's how you can stay safe
item.description: Cybercriminals have stolen hundreds of millions through AI-driven phishing, fake stores, and account takeover scams targeting users across financial platforms.

item.title: Airbus orders software fix to thousands of planes due to solar radiation risk
item.description: Flights were delayed and cancelled globally after Airbus ordered fixes to 6,000 of its A320 series planes, according to The Guardian. The company said it’s taking action because “analysis of a recent event involving an A320 Family aircraft has revealed that intense solar radiation may corrupt data critical to the functioning of flight controls.” Citing […]...

item.title: Black Friday sets online spending record of $11.8B, Adobe says
item.description: American consumers spent $11.8 billion online on Black Friday, according to data from Adobe Analytics, which says it tracks more than 1 trillion visits to U.S. retail websites.

item.title: Meta and Google could be about to sign a mega AI chip deal - and it could change everything in the tech space
item.description: Rising demand, shifting alliances, and limited fabrication capacity create unpredictable conditions as Meta considers a long-term Google TPU hardware partnership.

item.title: Behold, the black Apple Watch Ultra 2 is $200 off during Black Friday

The landfills of the world were better off without Apple’s first-gen ruggedized smartwatch filling it. Also, suggesting that you spend […]
